1.0.0.description:
Payment online chat SiteHeart provides a stable conversion in the chain: visitors → communications → payments

Presentation:
http://goo.gl/Vyfg1

SiteHeart Features

  1. Chat widget enables a customer not only to communicate with the operator while being on a site but also pay for goods or services presented on it with Visa / MasterCard.
  2. The chat window has all necessary information and functions that are always ready to use. It allows you to respond quickly in several dialogues and bill customers on time.
  3. Admin panel has everything you need to control operators and payments. You can customize Siteheart here, create forms, themes and templates, add card details and payment systems, create departments and grant operators roles.
